title: My blue essence from Loot didn't add to my blue essence
body:
Good afternoon,

I don't know if you can see in your systems the amount of blue essence of people ingame, but I had 4660 blue essence, I entered to loot, and there pumped a notification which said all my blue essence had become part of my PI etc which is now blue essence. The only thing is that when I pressed OK, the amount of blue essence didn't count on my already 4660 blue essence. Why is that? Is it a bug? How can I get my blue essence back? Was that blue essence already counted on my total blue essence?

Thank you for you attention,

AryaScarlet

replies.body: Sam. and i played my match
Go to your "Loot" tab, you should receive it there.

You need to play your first matchmade game, which will complete the quest and give you your bonus blue essence. 

xo <3
I played mine. they said i got it. but its not there
It is awarded in your 'Loot' tab as blue essence orbs. You have to open them and it will add them to your balance. ^ ^
yea idk for me i have like 6 blue orbs in loot but i cant open them, guess all my ips are gone, w/e
Oh okay, fine!! Thank you so much!!!
